name: Carla Perez (actress)
description: '''Carla Aparecida Perez Soares da Silva''' (''née'' '''Soares'''; born November 16, 1977) is a Brazilian singer, dancer, television presenter and former actress. She reached fame in the mid-1990s after performing as the blonde dancer with ''[[Axé (music)|axé]]'' group [[É o Tchan!]] (''loira do Tchan'').
